data.text: @EnriqueSoto8 @JCOGO_ASCO @BernabeCarolina @AnaVManana @COlazagasti @crisbergerot @PauloBergerot @drcoronacruz @NarjustDumaMD @ASCO @SMEOMX Congratulations Enrique, great work and contribution to Latin America cancer care.

Our findings provide important information that can be used to strengthen healthcare systems in Latin America, we NEED to learn from #COVID19 so that this does not happen again!
Great work from all team members and collaborators!!!!!
https://t.co/lh4e9fitFg

A concerning finding is that many noted a delay in potentially life-saving treatments such as #surgery or #radiotherapy 
Many had to change to less effective therapies 
https://t.co/lh4e9fitFg https://t.co/iusZU09jdX

We surveyed 704 oncologists from 19 countries in Latin America and asked them about practice changes related to #COVID19
Almost 3/4 reported a decrease in the number of new patients!
Most used telemedicine during the pandemic https://t.co/el0heDFd89
